quests.title: Baker's Helping Hand
quests.description: Marin the town baker needs help restocking ingredients and sharing fresh bread with the mayor.

objectives.description: Collect fresh ingredients from gathering spots around town.
Cook a batch of bread at any communal kitchen.
Visit the mayor with the newly baked loaf.

reward.description: A thank-you from Marin and the town treasury.

quests.title: Harvest Preparations
quests.description: Help the farm crew gather produce and dress the square for the autumn fair.

objectives.description: Collect baskets of freshly picked crops from the fields.
Add seasonal decorations around the harvest fair plaza.

reward.description: A share of the farm's finest autumn produce.

quests.title: Town Harvest Feast
quests.description: The mayor needs hearty dishes and cheerful hosts for the seasonal celebration.

objectives.description: Cook warm dishes to share during the harvest feast.
Welcome townsfolk and serve plates in the festival square.

reward.description: A bouquet from the mayor and a purse of festival scrip.

quests.title: Winter Lights Ceremony
quests.description: Craft lanterns and hang them around the plaza for the winter celebration.

objectives.description: Assemble delicate lanterns at the community workshop.
Hang lanterns throughout the plaza before the ceremony begins.

reward.description: Cozy winter supplies and a stipend from the library guild.
